alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:31PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima and southeastern Pinal Counties through 600 PM MST... At 531 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mount Lemmon/Summerhaven, or 7 miles east of Catalina, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects and blo over trees. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Catalina, Oro Valley, Oracle, Casas Adobes, Flowing Wells, Tanque Verde, Saddlebrooke, San Manuel, Mount Lemmon/Summerhaven, Sabino Canyon Recreation Area, Catalina State Park, Catalina Foothills, Campo Bonito, Oracle Junction, Seven Falls and Biosphere 2. This includes the following highways... Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 97, and between mile markers 102 and 103. Route 79 near mile marker 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
